content.description: Figure 1. A model of a biological process
content.question: Which of the following processes requires all of the steps represented in Figure 1 ?

choices.label: Cell signaling to increase gene expression in an animal cell
Replication of a retrovirus after it enters a host cell
Regulation of gene expression in a cell by <math alttext="micro R N A" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mtext>microRNA</mtext></mrow></mstyle></math>
Production of plasmids in a bacterial cell

content.answer: Replication of a retrovirus after it enters a host cell

skill.text: 2.A: Describe characteristics of visual representations of biological concepts and processes.
